products.description: Thank you Fuck Combustion staff , members & all past customers. This is for everyone of you that supported me up to this point. I would not be here without you NEED WORK? If you are interested in distribution to shops and friends please email matt@ineedhemp.com to discuss terms for selling the v3.. Guide for V3 PLEASE READ Œ© Divine Crossing Version 3 Rebuildable Ceramic Donut Heaterr Œ©- FuckCombustion Discount We recommend the Pico power supply for this heater for the most convenient set-up and use. Here is the link to the full kit. For water filtration please check out the hydratube and attachment. -KIT INCLUDES- Complete V3 with 13mm donut installed ready to go 2 extra replacement donuts and cups Dab tool and Screwdriver 5 extra screws Alcohol wipes Thank you for your interest in the Divine Crossing Version 3 ceramic rebuildable atomizer and taking the step away from metal coil heaters to something cleaner. I believe in tasting the terpenes in my concentrates without a metallic flavor. This is the third collaboration between Shenzhen Crossing and Divine Tribe, we have exchanged drafts and ideas to create a unique diffusion device. Here are a few instructions I would like to pass along to make your experience better. If your battery has a temperature control option please Temperature Control in Ni (Nickel Mode) I have noticed 100x better experience with temperature control rather than just wattage mode. -SET THE BATTERY FIRST- First time using the device start at the lowest wattage or temperature depending on your mod and work your way up. By doing this you are testing yourheater and finding the lowest setting in order to get the best essence and biggest cloud. Find the middleground for the best experience. Not all people enjoy the same settings, some like it hot with huge hits some enjoy easy clouds with more flavor. Find your best setting through practice. If you mess around with trying to fine tune your TC settings, you should try a TCR # of around 190 if you like the temperature on the screen to match the actual donut temp. Probably will not be final, or the best settings for all users on all mods, but I'm getting great, tasty, smooth, cool clouds with TCR 190 and 380-420F, and my infrared thermometer says the donut is the same temp as the screen at those settings. For more information and questions visit the DivineTribe You Tube channel Instructions when using Place half bb sized piece directly on donut, when hitting the vaporizer draw in lightly at first to avoid upward splatter. Hold it straight up and down, Not out and sideways, this will ensure you get a good hit. For best performance do small sessions and keep the piece clean with rubbing alcohol and a wipe. Do not leave in hot cars Do not store concentrates in device Clear out heater after each session Rebuild and Cleaning instructions Find clean area to work so screws do not fall to floor and get lost Unscrew 3 screws at base of ceramic housing Gently pull ceramic housing from metal base Unscrew both screws that hold donut wires to the 2 posts Gently wiggle and remove ceramic cup in an upward motion from posts Be careful with donut wires when removing donut coil from cup they will bend and break easy To Rebuild follow these steps in reverse Each piece can be cleaned separately with rubbing alcohol and a wipe Visit www.szcrossing.com for wholesale orders of 50 pcs or more V3 specs: Overall length- 56.6mm Width- 21.9mm Cup diameter- 11.8mm Inner mouthpiece diameter- 17.8mm Here is a link to the replacement v3 ceramic housing. Here is a link to the replacement v3 ceramic top piece. Here is a link to the replacement v3 ceramic donuts. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6TGFy7ziv0I https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dpduW-v9o8M

products.description:
New designed base for easy installation for side-heated Lightning cup NEW GLASS TOPS ARE NOW HERE! ADD QTY 1 OR 2 WITH YOUR KIT

Quest Lightning Diffuser Kit THE QUEST LIGHTNING Introducing the Quest Lightning : The Innovative Diffuser with Side-Heated Cup Design, Experience unparalleled convenience with easy cup replacement and high-quality performance. The Lightning's innovative side-heated cup design ensures even heating and consistent results, while the 14mm male-shaped top allows for hydratube attachments. New Glass Vortex Tops: We now offer newly produced glass vortex tops designed specifically for the Quest Lightning, an extra can be purchased to be included with your kit. These tops feature higher tubes to work perfectly with the taller cups, enhancing your diffusion experience. Replacement vortex tops can be purchased under a separate link here. Getting Started with the Quest Lightning: Attach the Quest Base: Securely connect the Quest base to your power supply Set Your Power Supply: Choose between Temperature Mode (TCR 125) or Wattage Mode (pulse button with 25w power). Skip for EZ Power Supply. Load the Concentrate: Place a small amount of your preferred concentrate into the heating cup. Secure the Top: Ensure the O-rings are clean and well-lubricated with vegetable oil for easy removal and attachment. Cleanliness is Key: Always clean the cup thoroughly with a Q-tip after each use. Optimal Performance and Longevity: Regular Cleaning: Maintain your Quest Lightning's peak performance by wiping it down with rubbing alcohol wipes and lubricating the O-rings frequently. Enhance Your Experience: We offer a wide range of accessories to elevate your experience. Customer Service: Our dedicated team is here to assist you with any inquiries or support needs. products.name: v3.5 Rebuildable Ceramic Heater
products.description:
Œ© Divine Crossing Version 3.5 Œ© battery not included see my other ads

If you are interested in distribution to shops and friends please email to discuss terms for selling the v3.5. Past customers email me for a discount matt@ineedhemp.com For water filtration please check out the hydratube and attachment. Guide for V3.5 PLEASE CLICK HERE TO READ -KIT INCLUDES- Complete V3.5 with 13mm donut installed ready to go 2 extra replacement donuts and cups (New Medium 10mm donut cup, and the Large 13mm donut and cup) Dab tool and Screwdriver 5 extra screws 2 Alcohol wipes Extra set of O-rings Thank you for your interest in the Divine Crossing Version 3.5 ceramic rebuildable atomizer and taking the step away from metal coil atomizers to something cleaner. I believe in tasting the terpenes in my concentrates without a metallic flavor. This is the fourth collaboration between Shenzhen Crossing and Divine Tribe, we have exchanged drafts and ideas to create a unique vaporizing device. Here are a few instructions I would like to pass along to make your experience better. If your battery has a temperature control option please Temperature Control in Ni (Nickel Mode) I have noticed 100x better experience with temperature control rather than just wattage mode. -SET THE BATTERY FIRST- First time using the device start at the lowest wattage or temperature depending on your mod and work your way up. By doing this you are testing your atomizer and finding the lowest setting in order to get the best flavor and biggest cloud. Find the middleground for the best experience. Not all people enjoy the same settings, some like it hot with huge hits some enjoy easy clouds with more flavor. Find your best setting through practice. If you mess around with trying to fine tune your TC settings, you should try a TCR # of around 190 if you like the temperature on the screen to match the actual donut temp. Probably will not be final, or the best settings for all users on all mods, but I'm getting great, tasty, smooth, cool clouds with TCR 190 and 380-420F, and my infrared thermometer says the donut is the same temp as the screen at those settings. For more information and questions visit the DivineTribe You Tube channel Instructions when using Place half bb sized piece directly on donut, when hitting the vaporizer draw in lightly at first to avoid upward splatter. Hold it straight up and down, Not out and sideways, this will ensure you get a good hit. For best performance do small sessions and keep the piece clean with rubbing alcohol and a wipe. Do not leave in hot cars Do not store concentrates in device Clear out Atomizer after each session Rebuild and Cleaning instructions Find clean area to work so screws do not fall to floor and get lost Gently pull ceramic housing from metal base Unscrew both screws that hold donut wires to the 2 posts Gently wiggle and remove ceramic cup in an upward motion from posts Be careful with donut wires when removing donut coil from cup they will bend and break easy To Rebuild follow these steps in reverse Each piece can be cleaned separately with rubbing alcohol and a wipe Visit www.szcrossing.com for wholesale orders of 50 pcs or more V3.5 specs: Overall length- 56.6mm Width- 21.9mm Cup diameter- 11.8mm Inner mouthpiece diameter- 17.8mm Here is a link to the replacement v3.5 ceramic mouthpiece. Here is a link to the replacement v3.5 ceramic donuts.

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { const canvas = document.getElementById('particleCanvas'); if (canvas && canvas.getContext) { const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; const particles = []; class Particle { constructor() { this.x = Math.random() * canvas.width; this.y = Math.random() * canvas.height; this.size = Math.random() * 4 + 1; this.speedX = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.speedY = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.opacity = Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.4; } update() { this.x += this.speedX; this.y += this.speedY; if (this.x < 0 || this.x > canvas.width) this.speedX *= -1; if (this.y < 0 || this.y > canvas.height) this.speedY *= -1; } draw() { ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(250,204,21,${this.opacity})`; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2); ctx.fill(); } } for (let i = 0; i < 120; i++) { particles.push(new Particle()); } function animateParticles() { ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); particles.forEach(p => { p.update(); p.draw(); }); requestAnimationFrame(animateParticles); } animateParticles(); window.addEventListener('resize', () => { canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; }); } });

products.description:
Introducing the Core eRig w/ Nice Dreamz Coil for concentrates, using the v5 side and bottom heated cup! The new Nice Dreamz assembly style lowered the metal rim of the coil for an easier way to load the concentrates into the ceramic heater. ‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer: For International Orders (non USA domestic shipments) - Shipping will cost more than $19. Please message üìß matt@ineedhemp.com for a shipping quote before ordering.

Introducing the Core 2.0 now with the Nice Dreamz coil assembly with the v5 side and bottom heated cup. An easy to use on the go piece with a fully heated high polish ceramic vaping surface. Better engineered than competing erigs on the market, in fact the unit is guaranteed for 1 year for any internal failure of any sort. Nice Dreamz Heater Coil: The heart of the Core 2.0, the Nice Dreamz Heater Coil, offers an unparalleled dabbing experience. With a modified assembly style, we‚Äôve lowered the supportive metal ring around the heater cup. This clever design exposes the edges of the cup, making loading your concentrates easier than ever before. Say goodbye to wastage and hello to precision dabbing. New glass top bubbler attachments for more versatility to view concentrates and keep the neck upright. Can be angled 3 different ways on the core with 3 holes placed on the bottom to match with the airhole intake on the base of the core. Check out the options below: Round Top Matrix Perc Round Top Strait Perc Flat Top Matrix Perc 14mm Hydratube Attachment 18mm Hydratube Attachment Recycler Top New tops sold separately here . Additional Cub base adapter sold separately here to help clean your Core v5 heater coil assembly. Core 2.0 Features One button functionality for ease of use üîò Fully heated high polish ceramic vaping surface üî• Rebuildable atomizer üîß Borosilicate Glass Bubbler üå¨Ô∏è Stainless Steel Carb Cap Tube üß¥ Four carefully tuned heat settings üî• Low maintenance üßπ Approx. 1 hour 45 minute charging time üîã 3150mah Li-Ion Battery Pack üîã Approx. 21 full sessions - mixed power settings ‚ö° What's Included Core 2.0 E-rig Base üß© Standard Core Bubbler üå¨Ô∏è Spinner Carb Cap üîÑ Carb Cap Tether (Black) ‚ö´ Silicone Base Cover/Sleeve (Black) ‚ö´ 1x Nice Dreamz Coil Assembly with V5 heater installed üåÄ 1x Spare V5 Heater üî• SS316 Dab Tool üîß 4x Spare coil Screws üî© Screwdriver üîß 2x Spare Carb Cap Tube O-rings üßµ 1x US Wall Plug üîå 1x USB-C Charging Cable üîå Cotton buds/Q-tips üßΩ Alcohol wipes üßº Upgraded Carry Case üß≥ Core 2.0 Instructions Hold - Manual fire up to 60 seconds üî• Two clicks - Activate session mode üîÑ Three Clicks - Change heat setting üî• Four Clicks - Display power level: üî¥ Low | ‚ö™ Medium | üü¢ Full Five Clicks - Lock or unlock Core 2.0 Base üîí Session Times and Temperatures The total session time for the Core 2.0 has been upgraded to 80 seconds, including pre-heat time. Blue - 12.5 second pre-heat - Approx. 401¬∞F üîµ Green - 13 second pre-heat - Approx. 428¬∞F üü¢ White - 17.5 second pre-heat - Approx. 464¬∞F ‚ö™ Red - 22.5 second pre-heat - Approx. 500¬∞F üî¥ Charge your base using the provided wall plug and cable. Fill bubbler from the top, when it is removed from the base. Ensure any excess liquid has been wiped away and that no water has flooded into the bottom compartment. If this happens turn the bubbler upside down and blow into the air hole at the bottom to clear this section. Then re-fill from the top. Place bubbler onto Core 2.0 Base at an angle, ensuring that the hole in the bubbler base aligns with the vapor pathway in the Core 2.0 base, then gently and firmly push it straight down into place. Check small screws in the atomizer base which hold the heater legs are fastened. These need to be tightened so they are firm, but not so much that they cut the wire legs off the heater. When this is done screw the atomizer into the Core 2.0 base. Place the carb cap tube on the base so that the wider angled side sits at the top, leaving the carp cab on the tether so that concentrate can be loaded onto the heater. Select desired heat setting (start low and work up to desired heat). See Instructions included with Core 2.0 for more session and usage details Cleaning Wipe out heater with a q-tip after each use Clean the area around the RDA heater weekly to stop residue building up Every month, approximately, wipe out the airway with a q-tip soaked in ISO - allow to fully dry before use Replace bubbler water daily To clean bubbler fill with hot water and shake to remove large residues. Soak in ISO to fully clean. Rinse thoroughly with warm water after soaking. RDA heater can be removed and screwed into a heat sink on a box mod, then run at 36W for 1-2 mins to perform a burn off cycle. Link for the heater coil sold separate here . Blue - Short-circuit warning üîµ Green - No atomizer warning üü¢ White - Over-heat warning ‚ö™ Red - Low battery warning üî¥ Warranty Information üìÑ For all warranty claims, please contact the store purchased from üè¨. The Core 2.0 power base and carry case are covered by a one-year manufacturer warranty against defects üß≥. document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { const canvas = document.getElementById('particleCanvas'); if (canvas && canvas.getContext) { const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; const particles = []; class Particle { constructor() { this.x = Math.random() * canvas.width; this.y = Math.random() * canvas.height; this.size = Math.random() * 4 + 1; this.speedX = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.speedY = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.opacity = Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.4; } update() { this.x += this.speedX; this.y += this.speedY; if (this.x < 0 || this.x > canvas.width) this.speedX *= -1; if (this.y < 0 || this.y > canvas.height) this.speedY *= -1; } draw() { ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(250,204,21,${this.opacity})`; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2); ctx.fill(); } } for (let i = 0; i < 120; i++) { particles.push(new Particle()); } function animateParticles() { ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); particles.forEach(p => { p.update(); p.draw(); }); requestAnimationFrame(animateParticles); } animateParticles(); window.addEventListener('resize', () => { canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; }); } });

this.y = Math.random() * canvas.height; this.size = Math.random() * 4 + 1; this.speedX = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.speedY = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.opacity = Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.4; } update() { this.x += this.speedX; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2); ctx.fill(); } } for (let i = 0; i < 120; i++) { particles.push(new Particle()); } function animateParticles() { ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); particles.forEach(p => { p.update(); p.draw(); }); requestAnimationFrame(animateParticles); } animateParticles(); window.addEventListener('resize', () => { canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; }); } });

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { const canvas = document.getElementById('particleCanvas'); if (canvas && canvas.getContext) { const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; const particles = []; class Particle { constructor() { this.x = Math.random() * canvas.width; this.y = Math.random() * canvas.height; this.size = Math.random() * 4 + 1; this.speedX = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.speedY = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.opacity = Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.4; } update() { this.x += this.speedX; this.y += this.speedY; if (this.x < 0 || this.x > canvas.width) this.speedX *= -1; if (this.y < 0 || this.y > canvas.height) this.speedY *= -1; } draw() { ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(250,204,21,${this.opacity})`; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2); ctx.fill(); } } for (let i = 0; i < 120; i++) { particles.push(new Particle()); } function animateParticles() { ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); particles.forEach(p => { p.update(); p.draw(); }); requestAnimationFrame(animateParticles); } animateParticles(); window.addEventListener('resize', () => { canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; }); } });

Options include: Bottomless quartz banger by itself Bottomless quartz banger with bubble carb cap Bottomless quartz banger with aluminum carb cap and two 4mm SIC terp pearls Bottomless quartz banger with titanium carb cap and two 4mm SIC terp pearls We recommend using the bottomless banger (bb) on a flat wide table with a dab mat, leaving yourself enough room for anything to happen. Leave yourself enough room to work since there are many moving pieces with your bb setup. When removing your device from the bb, we always recommend holding from the base of the banger walls and the metal base of the heater you are using. Then remove the bb vertically with a small twist. Do not remove at an angle ‚Äî otherwise you will crack the banger walls. DO NOT HOLD THE BANGER BY THE STEM. ALWAYS HOLD FROM THE BOWL. Always be sure your o-rings fit tight ‚Äî the fit should never be loose. Never force the base if the o-rings appear too tight or you may break the banger. Email us about any sizing issues. Due to mishandling, we will only guarantee these bangers up to 1 week. üîó Compatible Accessories Glass Dabber Carb Cap by itself Aluminum Carb Cap Magnetic Breakaway Extension Cables SiC Terp Pearls Affordable Dab Rig Perfect Dab Tools Additional Questions or Concerns ‚ùì üì∫ Watch tutorials on YouTube or join the Reddit Forum üìß Email matt@ineedhemp.com with any questions üí¨ Join us on Discord #BottomlessQuartzBanger #DivineTribe #DabTools

products.description:

Divine Tribe keeps your mod thriving with this open-source upgrade. Join our community for support! üåø @keyframes fade-in {

ü¶ä Arctic Fox for Eleaf iStick Pico ü¶ä Installation Instructions & Firmware ‚ö†Ô∏è Compatibility Notes üö® This guide is for the Eleaf iStick Pico with micro USB , which supports Arctic Fox firmware upgrades. The Type-C Pico I sell has built-in autofire but is not compatible with Arctic Fox. Ensure you use a micro USB data cable.[](https://www.e-cigarette-forum.com/threads/istick-pico-75-usb-c-firmware-upgradable.985055/) üåü Why Arctic Fox? Arctic Fox transforms your Pico with up to 8 customizable profiles, autofire up to 60 seconds, precise temperature control, and preheat settings. Divine Tribe provides this open-source firmware to keep your solid-performing mod thriving! ü¶ä[](https://github.com/GD386/ArcticFox)[](https://www.vaposearch.com/how-to-install-arctic-fox-firmware/) üõ†Ô∏è Installation Steps 1. Download NFE Tools üì• Download the NFE-Tools-v190703-21.46 ZIP file. If it fails, try another browser. Create an Arctic Fox folder, unzip the files, and open the nToolbox app. üìÇ 2. Connect Pico üîå Connect your Pico to your computer using a micro USB data cable (not all cables transmit data). In nToolbox, click Firmware Updater . üîç 3. Download Firmware üì¶ Download the Pico AF Firmware BIN File to your Arctic Fox folder. üíæ 4. Optional: Stock Autofire Firmware ‚öôÔ∏è Skip this for Arctic Fox. For stock firmware with autofire, download the Pico Autofire Firmware . Hold fire and ‚Äú+‚Äù to set seconds, double-click to activate, press once to stop early. üîß 5. Update Firmware üîÑ In nToolbox, click Update From a File , select the Arctic Fox or Autofire BIN file, and upload to your Pico. ‚úÖ 6. Load Configuration üõ†Ô∏è Use our pre-set configuration with 3 profiles for Quest, v4, and v5 Prototype: Download Configuration . Or customize your own with these instructions . In nToolbox, click ArcticFox Configuration , select the file, and click Upload Settings . Cycle profiles by pressing the fire button 3 times. üîÑ 7. Autofire Feature üî• Arctic Fox‚Äôs autofire lets you heat for up to 60 seconds with a double-click, no need to hold the button every 10 seconds like stock firmware. Perfect for Divine Tribe atomizers! üåø[](https://vapingunderground.com/threads/eleaf-pico-firmware-update.283859/) üåê Join Divine Tribe Connect with us! Watch tutorials on YouTube , join our Reddit forum, or chat on Discord . document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { const canvas = document.getElementById('particleCanvas'); if (canvas && canvas.getContext) { const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; const particles = []; class Particle { constructor() { this.x = Math.random() * canvas.width; this.y = Math.random() * canvas.height; this.size = Math.random() * 4 + 1; this.speedX = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.speedY = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.opacity = Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.4; } update() { this.x += this.speedX; this.y += this.speedY; if (this.x < 0 || this.x > canvas.width) this.speedX *= -1; if (this.y < 0 || this.y > canvas.height) this.speedY *= -1; } draw() { ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(250,204,21,${this.opacity})`; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2); ctx.fill(); } } for (let i = 0; i < 120; i++) { particles.push(new Particle()); } function animateParticles() { ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); particles.forEach(p => { p.update(); p.draw(); }); requestAnimationFrame(animateParticles); } animateParticles(); window.addEventListener('resize', () => { canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; }); } });

‚ú® Thick Hemp T-Shirt ‚ú® 55% Hemp, 45% Organic Cotton üåø üåü Premium Hemp Comfort Our Thick Hemp T-Shirt (260 GSM) blends 55% hemp and 45% organic cotton for a stylish, durable fit. Hypoallergenic, mold-resistant, and breathable, it keeps you warm yet cool. Order one size up for shrinkage. Discounts on multiples‚Äîemail matt@ineedhemp.com for wholesale quotes. üåøüëï üå± Why Hemp Fabric? Hemp fabric, derived from the Cannabis sativa plant, has been used for millennia, from ancient Chinese textiles to medieval European sails. Its superior strength‚Äîfour times that of cotton‚Äîresists wear and tear, maintaining shape through countless washes. Unlike synthetic fibers, hemp‚Äôs natural properties include UV resistance, blocking harmful rays, and thermal regulation, keeping you comfortable in varied climates. Its porous fibers wick moisture, enhancing breathability, while its antimicrobial nature reduces odors without chemical treatments. Hemp grows rapidly, yielding up to 250% more fiber per acre than cotton, using minimal water and no pesticides, making it a sustainable choice. Despite these advantages, hemp‚Äôs popularity waned due to prohibition in the 20th century, which restricted cultivation and stigmatized the plant. Cotton‚Äôs industrial dominance and cheaper production also overshadowed hemp‚Äôs labor-intensive processing. Today, as legal barriers ease, hemp‚Äôs eco-friendly, durable, and comfortable qualities are poised for a comeback, offering a superior alternative to cotton and synthetics for conscious consumers. üåç üéâ Benefits of Hemp Clothing üåø Durable, four times stronger than cotton, resists wear after washing üé® Retains vibrant color better than other fabrics üëï Soft, hypoallergenic natural fiber, gentle on skin üí® Naturally resists bacteria, prevents odor, highly breathable üåç Sustainable, high-yield crop, uses minimal water üõí Colors & Sizes üö® Order one size up to account for washing shrinkage. products.description:
‚ö° Lightning Pen Diffuser Lightning Pen diffuser with crucible cup design and side-heated walls for pure flavor. 900mAh battery, 3 heat settings, 15-second autofire, and replaceable heaters. No metal coils for easy cleaning.

‚ö° Lightning Pen Diffuser - Pen-Style Concentrate Solution üéØ Advanced Lightning Pen Diffuser for Pure Flavor üíé Crucible Cup Technology Introducing our Lightning Pen diffuser , designed for those who demand the purest flavor from their concentrate experience. Furthermore, this Lightning Pen diffuser uses a small crucible cup with side-heated walls instead of metal coils for maximum flavor and easy cleaning. Additionally, this pen-style diffuser provides a smooth, enjoyable experience with an eco-friendly approach. Whether you're looking for optimal flavor or easy maintenance, we've got you covered! üî• Lightning Pen Diffuser Performance Benefits Our Lightning Pen diffuser provides excellent flavor preservation and vapor quality with its unique crucible design. Moreover, this makes it ideal for users who want consistent performance without the drawbacks of metal coils. Additionally, the pen includes three heat settings for customizable temperature control. Furthermore, the 900mAh battery ensures that this Lightning Pen diffuser delivers reliable performance, maintaining optimal heating across multiple sessions. üîß Why Choose Lightning Pen Over Traditional Metal Coil Pens üí® Crucible Cup vs Metal Coil Benefits Lightning Pen technology provides naturally better flavor preservation compared to metal coil designs. Additionally, it's ideal for those who want easy cleaning and maintenance. Moreover, the crucible cup design is not only more efficient but also eliminates the flavor interference common with metal coils. Furthermore, the pen requires minimal upkeep while providing excellent vapor production. Consequently, this makes it the smart choice for users seeking quality Lightning Pen diffusers with proven performance. üíé Lightning Pen Diffuser Specifications and Features Device Specifications ‚ö° 900mAh Rechargeable Battery üî• Three Heat Settings üíé Mini Lightning Heaters (10mm x 6mm) üîß Replaceable Crucible Cup ‚ö° 15-second Autofire Function Operation Controls Function Button Clicks Power On/Off 5 Clicks Heat Setting 3 Clicks Autofire 2 Clicks Session Limit 3 intervals max üíé Key Features & Benefits of Lightning Pen Diffuser üíé Crucible Cup Design Side-heated walls üî• Three Heat Settings Customizable temperature ‚ö° 900mAh Battery Long-lasting performance üîß Replaceable Heater Rebuildable design üí® Easy Cleaning No metal coil interference ‚è±Ô∏è Autofire Function 15-second intervals üìã Lightning Pen Diffuser Usage and Safety Instructions ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Safety Information The ceramic heater cup can reach up to 600¬∞F and may cause burns. Handle with caution. Clean and lubricate O-rings daily with vegetable oil to maintain performance. products.name: Launch - Seedmass X Divine Tribe V5 CUB with DNA mod customized kit
products.description: V5 CUB with DNA mod customized kit includes: - Modified V5 CUB - Black Silicone Drip Tip - DNA (battery not included) - V5 Tuned eScribe Material - All testing data - Exclusive Collab Sticker Seedmass has collaborated with DVT to release a new kit for Lost Vape Grus, which will have monthly drops of 10-20 units. This kit is designed for beginners who want to experience the best without having to tune and use the v5 themselves. please get in touch to ask and questions or purchase My website is https://seedmass.dev and email seed@seedmass.dev A few significant changes have been made to the CUB, including a cut-off metal knurled rim for more accuracy when tuning with temperature probes and brass screws that are ground flat. The tuning process is done using five custom high-accurate platinum PT100 probes, which allows for mapping the surface of each v5 using cubic interpolation. All of this information is used to create a custom material profile that DNA uses. The V5 is a staple of what makes Divine Tribe so great! It's perfect for users who want the best possible experience without having to tune it in themselves. This can be confusing for beginners and take some trial and error. Having the heater pre-tuned takes the guesswork out of the V5. Seedmass highly recommends picking up the Hubble Bubble for water filtration, and all replacement parts can be purchased from ineedhemp.com. The choice of either Thelma or Hyperion, which both support 21700/18650 batteries, is also available. Make sure to purchase a high-discharge battery like the Molicel P42A. The Hyperion is rated IP68, which means it's waterproof, dustproof, and shock-resistant to IP68 standards. This drop will open at 1 AM on March 3rd EST with only 10 units. It will be a pre-order with shipping by the end of March. All future drops will not be pre-order and will ship within the same week of order. Only 7 drops will be done for this collab: March, April, May, September, October, November, and December, after which no more units will be sold. 100% of profits go back into the company to allow for the development of cutting-edge technology. Currently, Seedmass is working on high-end rosin presses and an open-source box mod for the v5. Additionally, a tutorial series about the v5 will be added to the website, going through the ins and outs of the v5 cleaning and usage, not just for DNA, but also for Arctic Fox and maybe even the Pico 2. Thank you to all of the dudes on discord especially OGTechWiki!

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { const canvas = document.getElementById('particleCanvas'); if (canvas && canvas.getContext) { const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; const particles = []; class Particle { constructor() { this.x = Math.random() * canvas.width; this.y = Math.random() * canvas.height; this.size = Math.random() * 4 + 1; this.speedX = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.speedY = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.opacity = Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.4; } update() { this.x += this.speedX; this.y += this.speedY; if (this.x < 0 || this.x > canvas.width) this.speedX *= -1; if (this.y < 0 || this.y > canvas.height) this.speedY *= -1; } draw() { ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(250,204,21,${this.opacity})`; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2); ctx.fill(); } } for (let i = 0; i < 120; i++) { particles.push(new Particle()); } function animateParticles() { ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); particles.forEach(p => { p.update(); p.draw(); }); requestAnimationFrame(animateParticles); } animateParticles(); window.addEventListener('resize', () => { canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; }); } });

products.description:
Welcome to the Tribe! Click here If you would like to get the Complete Kit w/ Mod @keyframes pulse {
0% { transform: scale(1); }
50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
100% { transform: scale(1); }

‚ú® Divine Crossing XL v5 Ceramic Heater ‚ú® üî•‚ú® the Divine Crossing XL V5 Rebuildable Concentrate Heater üî•‚ú® We took everything you love about the original V5 and made it even better. The XL ceramic heater cup fits right onto your existing setup, so there‚Äôs no hassle. Thicker leads mean it‚Äôs tougher, and the taller metal top boosts airflow for those smooth, flavorful hits you crave. Plus, the bigger cup walls make cleanup a breeze ‚Äì no more splashing! üßº üåÄ Upgrade Further with an All-Glass Vortex Top Each kit includes a complementary glass top specially designed for the XL cup, we prefer a 14mm glass vortex top with a 4mm tube which will be added to the order unless otherwise specified. ü™ü This top enhances your experience with optimized airflow. If you‚Äôd prefer a different option, let us know when placing your order. üìù For those looking to customize further, you can also opt for extra glass vortex top. It takes airflow up a notch, giving you an even better experience. Go ahead, make your V5 the best it can be! üöÄ ‚ö†Ô∏è Instructions & Maintenance Take Immediate Caution: Ceramic heater cups can reach temperatures of up to 600¬∞F and may cause serious burns. Please be careful when handling the unit. üî• Each part can be replaced, and the entire unit can be rebuilt. There is no need to discard the whole assembly if one part breaks; we designed it with eco-friendly concepts in mind. üåø The V5 side and bottom heated ceramic cup with vortex airflow is temperature-controlled, making it the most effective way to conserve and experience concentrates while allowing for maximum vapor at the lowest temperatures. üí® üîã Take Note of Battery/Mod Settings Wattage: 27-37W (Pulsing button) üí° TCR Value: 200, using 36W to reach 500¬∞F üå°Ô∏è Ultimately, you will want to practice to get the best experience. Some mods produce more power than others at the same settings. To preserve the side and bottom heated ceramic cups, start at a low setting and gradually work your way up to find a happy middle ground of flavor and clouds. ‚òÅÔ∏è üìñ How to Use Always keep your O-rings clean and lubricated with a vegetable oil of your choice. This makes it easier to remove the top. Place a small amount (2-5 hits max) of concentrate into the side and bottom heated ceramic cup. Keep the unit upright throughout the entire session; do not tip it, or the concentrate will pour out of the cup. Press the button on the mod to start heating the cup and allow the concentrate to boil and vaporize. Now draw slowly; this will allow for maximum vapor and conserve concentrates in the cup from splashing out. Make sure to maintain heat on the cup so that vapor is produced throughout the session. Sessions should not exceed one minute. ‚è±Ô∏è Keep the temperatures low enough to avoid burning the concentrates to a char (dry). üî• Always use a Q-tip to clean the cup after each session to maintain cleanliness and performance. Wipe down and clean the glass top while it‚Äôs still warm to avoid reclaim buildup in the vapor pathway. Allow the unit to cool down for 3 minutes before the next session. üßº üîß Installing and Maintaining Your Ceramic Heater Under the right settings, both the standard and XL cups should last a long time. When a ceramic heater cup goes out or the resistance rises, you can replace it by unscrewing the two screws that hold the cup's lead wires fastened to the deck. Loosen the screws, gently pull out the cup, and remove it. üî© Every now and then, you‚Äôll want to burn off residue on the cup. Set your mod to 38W in wattage mode (this can be less for some mods; always start low and see). Hold the unit upside down while delivering only two minutes of heat to the cup, then STOP and allow it to cool completely before the next cleaning session. üßº üéÅ Kit Includes Complete XL v5 assembled (ready to go) üöÄ 1 extra XL v5 side and bottom ceramic heater cup üîÑ 1 extended all steel v4 top üõ†Ô∏è Dab tool üß∞ 4 extra screws, tool and o-rings üî© Cotton swabs and alcohol wipes üßº Instruction Manual üìú üåê Additional Questions or Concerns ‚ùì Be sure to check out our YouTube channel for instructional videos. Also, check out our forum on Reddit . We are an active community with many users ready to help out. üìπ As always feel free to contact matt@ineedhemp.com with any issues. üìß Join our community on Discord for additional support and discussions! üí¨ For DNA mods The Vapor Ninja has taken the time to figure it out click here to go to his site for settings and other useful information #DivineCrossing #XLV5 #CeramicHeater #Vaporizer #Concentrates #VortexAirflow #EcoFriendlyVape #DabRig #PortableVaporizer üîó Return to Homepage

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { const canvas = document.getElementById('particleCanvas'); if (canvas && canvas.getContext) { const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; const particles = []; class Particle { constructor() { this.x = Math.random() * canvas.width; this.y = Math.random() * canvas.height; this.size = Math.random() * 4 + 1; this.speedX = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.speedY = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.opacity = Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.4; } update() { this.x += this.speedX; this.y += this.speedY; if (this.x < 0 || this.x > canvas.width) this.speedX *= -1; if (this.y < 0 || this.y > canvas.height) this.speedY *= -1; } draw() { ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(250,204,21,${this.opacity})`; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2); ctx.fill(); } } for (let i = 0; i < 120; i++) { particles.push(new Particle()); } function animateParticles() { ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); particles.forEach(p => { p.update(); p.draw(); }); requestAnimationFrame(animateParticles); } animateParticles(); window.addEventListener('resize', () => { canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; }); } });

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { const canvas = document.getElementById('particleCanvas'); if (canvas && canvas.getContext) { const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; const particles = []; class Particle { constructor() { this.x = Math.random() * canvas.width; this.y = Math.random() * canvas.height; this.size = Math.random() * 4 + 1; this.speedX = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.speedY = Math.random() * 0.6 - 0.3; this.opacity = Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.4; } update() { this.x += this.speedX; this.y += this.speedY; if (this.x < 0 || this.x > canvas.width) this.speedX *= -1; if (this.y < 0 || this.y > canvas.height) this.speedY *= -1; } draw() { ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(250,204,21,${this.opacity})`; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2); ctx.fill(); } } for (let i = 0; i < 120; i++) { particles.push(new Particle()); } function animateParticles() { ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); particles.forEach(p => { p.update(); p.draw(); }); requestAnimationFrame(animateParticles); } animateParticles(); window.addEventListener('resize', () => { canvas.width = canvas.offsetWidth; canvas.height = canvas.offsetHeight; }); } });

Each banger is smooth, clean, precise airflow and 25mm outer diameter. We recommend using the bottomless banger (bb) on a flat wide table with a dab mat, leaving yourself enough room for anything to happen. Leave yourself enough room to work since there are many moving pieces with your bb setup. When removing your device from the bb, we always recommend holding from the base of the banger walls and the metal base of the heater you are using. Then remove the bb vertically with a small twist. Do not remove at an angle ‚Äî otherwise you will crack the banger walls. DO NOT HOLD THE BANGER BY THE STEM. ALWAYS HOLD FROM THE BOWL. Always be sure your O-rings fit tight ‚Äî the fit should never be loose. Never force the base if the O-rings appear too tight or you may break the banger.
